logo_image.logo_description: The TrailNest logo features a stylized mountain range above a bold, clean wordmark that reads 'TrailNest'. The typography uses a modern sans-serif font with slightly rounded corners, evoking both rugged durability and approachability. The 'A' in 'Trail' is shaped like a minimalist tent, while the 'N' in 'Nest' subtly resembles a winding trail. The color palette uses a deep forest green (#2E4D2C) and a complementary sky blue (#1C9CDC), reinforcing the brand's outdoor adventure theme.

symbol_integration.tent_A: A in 'Trail' resembles a pitched tent
symbol_integration.trail_N: N in 'Nest' mimics a curving trail

metadata.use_case: Product packaging, email headers, social media, outdoor signage

announcement_strip.text: Explore the new TrailNest Spring 2025 Gear Lineup!

hero_image.hero_description: A hero image showing a scenic mountain backdrop with a glowing TrailNest Horizon 6 Tent set up at golden hour. Next to the tent, a hiker adjusts a TrailNest NovaBeam 400 camping lantern, casting soft light on the surrounding gear. Above the scene is bold text reading 'Spring 2025 Gear Drop' with a glowing compass icon beside it.

pitch_section.title: Camp Smarter, Travel Farther
pitch_section.pitch: Our all-new Horizon 6 Tent and NovaBeam 400 Lantern were designed for reliability, comfort, and adventure. Whether you're venturing solo or setting up a base for the crew, TrailNest gear has you covered.

qr_image.qrcode_description: A green QR code with the letters 'FPO' overlaid in bold black text in the center. 'FPO' stands for 'For Placement Only', indicating that this is a placeholder image intended to represent a QR code location in design or layout drafts.

banner_image.banner_description: A promotional banner with a forest green background. On the left, text reads 'Free Shipping' in bold white. On the right, smaller text in light green says 'On all new TrailNest gear orders through May 15'.

image.image_description: A close-up photo of the Horizon 6 Tent pitched in alpine terrain, featuring its lightweight frame, dual vestibules, and mesh panels for ventilation.

columns.title: Horizon 6 Tent
columns.paragraph_text: A spacious, all-weather tent designed for comfort and rapid setup—built to handle elevation and sudden weather shifts with ease.

image.image_description: A product shot of the NovaBeam 400 camping lantern on a camp table, glowing beside a trail map and metal cup at dusk.

columns.title: NovaBeam 400 Lantern
columns.paragraph_text: Brighten your nights with our compact lantern featuring a USB charger and long-lasting light—your campfire alternative.

qr_image.qrcode_description: A green QR code with the letters 'FPO' overlaid in bold black text in the center. 'FPO' stands for 'For Placement Only', indicating that this is a placeholder image intended to represent a QR code location in design or layout drafts.

terms_section.paragraph_text: Terms and Conditions for TrailNest SafeTrack In-Gear Adventure Kit: This is a limited time offer. To receive the $15 TrailNest credit you must (1) be a TrailNest+ member ; (2) place your first qualifying In-Gear Adventure Kit Delivery by 7/23/2025. Promotional credit expires at 11:59 p.m. (PT) August 1st, 2025. See http://www.trailnest.ca/gc-legal for complete terms and conditions.
